description: This API is in preview release for Amazon Connect and is subject to change. For the specified version of Amazon Lex, returns a paginated list of all the Amazon Lex bots currently associated with the instance. Use this API to return both Amazon Lex V1 and V2 bots.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: LexVersion
parameters.description: The version of Amazon Lex or Amazon Lex V2.

nested_items.name: LexBots
nested_items.description: The names and Amazon Web Services Regions of the Amazon Lex or Amazon Lex V2 bots associated with the specified instance.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Lex bot.

nested_items.name: LexRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where the Amazon Lex bot was created.

nested_items.name: AliasArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Lex V2 bot.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If there are additional results, this is the token for the next set of results.
